permission_info.receiving_read: View list and details of receiving (inbound) documents. Does not allow creating or completing receipts.
permission_info.receiving_write: Create and complete receipts — register incoming stock and update balances. Required for receiving in mobile app or admin panel.
permission_info.inventory_read: View inventory balances, lots, locations. Does not allow adjustments or edits.
permission_info.inventory_adjust: Manual stock adjustment (shortage/overage). Risky operations: post movements, create lots. Usually controller or admin only.
permission_info.inventory_count: Enter inventory counts. Distinct from adjust — for count operations only.
permission_info.inventory_move_zone: Move stock to a zone (e.g. expired/damaged). Picker may only move to EXPIRED/DAMAGED.
permission_info.documents_read: View picking documents — list, lines, status. Does not allow cancelling documents.
permission_info.documents_edit_status: Change document status — mainly cancel. Required to stop a picking document.
permission_info.orders_read: View orders list and details. Does not allow sync or send to picking.
permission_info.orders_write: Sync orders from SmartUP and send to picking (assign). Admin or controller task.
permission_info.picking_read: View picking documents and lines, search product by scanner.
permission_info.picking_write: Picking actions: pick, complete, send to controller. Main permission for picker.
permission_info.locations_read: View locations list. Does not allow create or edit.
permission_info.movements_read: View stock movements (receipt, ship, adjust). Useful for audit.
permission_info.audit_read: Audit log — who did what and when.
permission_info.reports_read: View reports (stock, FEFO risk, picker performance, etc.).
